channel.title: Teleports and levels
channel.description:
Okay so I'm starting a source and the teleports don't require a level so I'm wondering how to make it so they do require levels(the rs levels for teles) also how do i make it so when you teleport to falador you don't teleport in the same place? Please help :)
edit: i know how to change the coords of the teles but i don't know how to make them tele randomly by like 1 coord or 2 coords
